lead_paragraph: Kosovo, accepted as FIFA members only three weeks ago, won their first fully-recognised international when they beat Faroe Islands 2-0 on Friday despite playing for nearly one hour with 10 men.

headline.print_headline: Ten-Man Kosovo Beat Faroes to Win First Full International
headline.main: Ten-Man Kosovo Beat Faroes to Win First Full International
